subject: Re: Your Refinace Approval  (2007 Lowest: 25 Y.Fixed - 4.22 %)
body:
Client Updates:

Thank you for choosing LenderTree Refi Group for your Refinance  needs.

We have pre_Approved your Refinance Application. In order to get you the BEST Rate at LenderTree Annual Mortgage Promotion event, we need your info to be verified.

Your File #: G24-1502722643
Lowest Rate: 4.29 +  %
Amount: up to $570, 000

Please visit the link below to complete your verification, so we can start paperwork NOW.

Thank You,
Glen Lloyd
LenderTree Refi, Ltd.
